title: PROJECT: Lucian bug with Tahm Kench

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
When Douvered by Tahm Kench ally or enemy with Lucian passive active.

You see the glow of the guns through the body of Tahm.

replies.body: The best is to Devour your ally Lucian when he ults and run down the enemy. It's like machine gun Tahm. Good times.
Thanks for the report! We'll see what's going on here!
